Heroes_Villains.States.State

    Heroes_Villains

    • Uses of State in Heroes_Villains.States

      Subclasses of State in Heroes_Villains.States 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AdminState
      Class of admin state of the game, used to bring up an admin control pane when the team is named 'ADMIN'
      class  BattleState
      Class for battle state of the game, manages battles and minigames against villains
      class  ControlsState
      Class for the game's control state, simply lists out the controls
      class  EndState
      Class for the ending state of the game, takes a boolean value to determine wether the game was won or lost and displays the appropriate screen
      class  GameState
      Class for game state of the game, this is the state in which the player is moving between rooms and cities, it includes core gameplay functionality
      class  MenuState
      Class for the menu state of the game, this allows the user to start the game, view the controls, or exit the game
      class  PauseState
      Class for the pause state of the game, entered when the escape key is pressed, allows user to go back to menu or controls state
      class  SetupState
      Class for creating the games setup state, this allows the user to set a team name, the number of cities to explore, and the number of heros that will be on there team.
      class  TeamBuilderState
      Class for the team builder state, renders the team and allows you to add and remove heros from it before eventually starting the game
      Fields in Heroes_Villains.States declared as State 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static State StateHandler.lastState 
      static State StateHandler.state 
      Methods in Heroes_Villains.States that return State 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static State StateHandler.getLastState()
      Method for getting the previous state of the game
      static State StateHandler.getState()
      Method for getting the state of the game
      Methods in Heroes_Villains.States with parameters of type State 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void StateHandler.setState(State newState)
      Method for setting the game into a new state
